item.title: About this blog/me
item.description: Hello! Tea, anyone ? ☺ —> Well, well, well! This has been brewing in the kettle of my heart/mind since long… And the time has finally come to serve 1 it! Confession: I am an ardent lover of Tea—a fact my friends all over the world can vouch for. (No offence meant; you are free to substitute Tea with Coffee or whatever beverage (or activity!) that you love with the same connotation.
